Reviews.title: Absolutely shocking
Reviews.detailed_review: Absolutely shocking! Followed a fb ad, created an account and deposited €10. No problem. Couldn't find the offer, used their chat bot to enquire why and was told my account had been deactivated with no explanation. Spent over 2 hours, being passed to at least 6 people, submitted countless photos with ID - which in spite of a premium phone camera - were not 'clear' enough, only to be told another department would email me. They did, and asked me to do everything again as if I had contacted no-one before. So in my opinion, from falsely advertising an offer to now refusing to re-open my account or refund my money, I smell a rotten scam.

Reviews.title: Kept telling me over and over that my…
Reviews.detailed_review: Kept telling me over and over that my driving license wasn’t a valid form of ID and to send additional ID (I don’t have any). They finally (after three days of them telling me over and over that I needed to send another form of photo ID) they finally gave me access to my account again. Massive faff, not worth it.

Reviews.title: William Hill closed my account because…
Reviews.detailed_review: William Hill closed my account because I had self excluded from Mr Green over 10 years ago. I still have monies in my account which need to be repaid, plus several ante post bets on the Euros. Advised to use live chat who told me I would be contacted by email or phone to resolve, but I have heard nothing after 4 weeks, yet I am still chasing them. Since Hills took their operations overseas, like many other bookies, they have gone downhill fast.

Reviews.title: DEFINE WHAT IS MENT BY THE WORD…
Reviews.detailed_review: DEFINE WHAT IS MENT BY THE WORD BOOKMAKER??????? PUT ODDS UP TAKE A BET??????? Today ive gone into bet 2 horses in Ladbrokes on machines after 5 bets for each horse every machine said max stake ZERO...So id got 25ew and 60ew....I said to my mate il go to Betfred see if early betting at compiegne you go to William Hill so of we go,Great freds got early odds at counter so i have £40ew at 25/1..£60ew at 9/1 and £20 ew double...Back at car i say WHAT YOU GOT? Nothing!!!! My friend put money in terminal and wasnt allowed to place a bet so he goes upto the counter and asks why wont the machine take a bet in france to which hes informed by the member of staff in Sutton in ashfield shop that they have been told to not take any bets on the french racing 🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣 My friend said So why have you priced the races up if you wont take a bet???? TOP OF REVIEW DEFINE THE WORD BOOKMAKER...Because William Hill are NOT a bookmaker....ps both horses lost THATS WOT YOU CALL GAMBLING 🤣🤣🤣

Reviews.title: Impossible to get help or customer service! Do not ever use this company!
Reviews.detailed_review: I bet a few pounds here and there. I win and then use the few pound win to do another. I accrued £18.50 in my balance. They won’t give me my winnings. William Hill has blocked my account and want a million ID documents and photos of a whole host of things which I can’t supply. I could get a mortgage easier than getting help with my account. There is no customer service email or tel number. They have auto bot chats which put you in a loop and cannot get anywhere. Asked someone to phone me and they won’t. Dreadful company, don’t ever open an account as you will lose your money as I have.

Reviews.title: The customer service is disgusting
Reviews.detailed_review: The service is appalling! They imposed a limit on my account and blocked me from withdrawing funds. I used live chat and spoke to Nigel, then to Brendon, the supervisor, who abruptly ended the chat! I spent over an hour with both of them, going in circles with no resolution. When I asked to speak to a manager, they ended the conversation. It's 2024, and it's against regulations to deny a customer the right to escalate their complaint!

Reviews.title: Not trustworthy, useless and faceless
Reviews.detailed_review: Cash out facility available on my bet, tried over 6 times and it failed on every occasion. I complained and got the corporate diatribe, ‘it’s open to circumstances changing ??? 6 times in 2 mins 🤣 and this is not the first time ! If you want cash out, steer clear, from experience every other betting site is better because these are useless. Now bet £5 for free bet, no free bet credited ! This company is meant to be big in its field, don’t be fooled, useless, doesn’t keep its promises, faceless and doesn’t care, go elsewhere there are far far better

Reviews.title: Stolen funds from me!
Reviews.detailed_review:
Only help option is live chat. You'll battle the robot before being given to MJ. Hopefully you like short answers that don't quite sort you out. Because MJ will cut and paste then close the chat. Think you're going to play the system by typing 2 questions in? MJ will anser the first... and then close the chat. Have fun with the robot assistant everyone.

Update: they’ve decided to close my account as they can’t verify who I am. They still haven’t told me what documentation they want. So it’s rather difficult to show them any. They also have ignored my request to know if I have any funds in the account. Looks like it’s time to get the law involved.

Reviews.title: Rigged crap

Reviews.title: This site has went the same way as all…
Reviews.detailed_review: This site has went the same way as all the rest, they're just money hungry robbers! I used to champion this site for being the only one that had fair play, not anymore. 30 games of slingo and not a single, even bare minimum win, thats appalling by anybodies standards. Haven't won on their bingo in 2 years, always the same names winning though eh?? I can easily rip through £100 in less than an hour and the slots have played terrible for the last 8 months, if you are lucky enough to get a scatter/bonus round rest assured they'll only allow you to scrape the minimum win. Just spent my last tenner on their site and not a single penny back on the lowest stake available, thats a lot of empty spins! Their promos have turned into a slap in the face too, you used to regularly get 5 free spins, now you have to stake £5 to get any, and they are always on a game that no one with half a brain would actually spend real money on! I'm convinced they've tweaked their site so getting a payout is impossible, the rtp has most definitely been altered yet customers aren't informed before play which would at least give us an option on whether to deposit or not. it's not all about luck, even the dodgiest bookie has to pay out now and again or they would have no business. The law of averages should come into play at some point, throwing money at them in the hopes of clawing something back has become my norm and i'm so fed up with it.

Reviews.title: William Hill customer service is a…
Reviews.detailed_review:
William Hill customer service is a disgrace.
Froze my account because I only put in £10, won & won to £85 up. Lost a little, withdrew £50 but left £25 there which I can’t get or use.
They are demanding stupid documents… one of which is impossible (proof of payment from my bank to WH made within las 3 months) I only made one deposit 8 months ago!
One demand is in breach of my banks security policy, proof of ownership of my debit card… (a photo of which would reveal all my information including security number)
Another demand is simply silly…. A photo of me holding my WH username handwritten on a piece of paper but they won’t say what for!... handwriting sample?
I’ve sent multiple emails, always get same computer-generated reply. Basically, supply everything or account remains frozen.
They have already had a photo of me with my driving licence, my latest credit card statement (front page only) and my latest bank statement showing my address.
They say I can go to willhill second opinon for a second opinion but all emails have bounced back undelivered.
Rubbish company.

Reviews.title: Closed my account and won't payout
Reviews.detailed_review: 1 star is too much. This fraud bookie closed my account with over €70 in it without any warning and no chance of them reopening it! Absolute fraud. Avoid!

Reviews.title: Won £1300 refuse to payout asked for Id…
Reviews.detailed_review: Won £1300 refuse to payout asked for Id to verify my account sent everything asked kept saying they needed different proof of address have my funds on hold refuse to release them but quick enough to take over £400 off me then refuse to payout wanted image of bank card so I scribbled what they told me to scribble out and sent that also confirming the card used matched the one on my account not accepted even tho my last name was on my card, if you do not pay out my winnings I will be taking you to court!!

Reviews.title: Worst experience ever with any betting…
Reviews.detailed_review: Worst experience ever with any betting site and I’ve used most major ones in uk and Ireland they asked me for a picture of me holding my passport and holding a bank statement and holding a piece of paper with my username on it and then rejected it as not valid to verify my identity it’s the most ridiculous process I’ve ever came across most apps will accept a simple picture of id and proof of address not these absolute scammers! When trying to withdraw aswell but will happily let you put money in without verification disgusting

Reviews.title: This site has went the same way as all…
Reviews.detailed_review: This site has went the same way as all the rest, they're just money hungry robbers! I used to champion this site for being the only one that had fair play, not anymore. 30 games of slingo and not a single, even bare minimum win, thats appalling by anybodies standards. Haven't won on their bingo in 2 years, always the same names winning though eh?? I can easily rip through £100 in less than an hour and the slots have played terrible for the last 8 months, if you are lucky enough to get a scatter/bonus round rest assured they'll only allow you to scrape the minimum win. Just spent my last tenner on their site and not a single penny back on the lowest stake available, thats a lot of empty spins! Their promos have turned into a slap in the face too, you used to regularly get 5 free spins, now you have to stake £5 to get any, and they are always on a game that no one with half a brain would actually spend real money on! I'm convinced they've tweaked their site so getting a payout is impossible, the rtp has most definitely been altered yet customers aren't informed before play which would at least give us an option on whether to deposit or not. it's not all about luck, even the dodgiest bookie has to pay out now and again or they would have no business. The law of averages should come into play at some point, throwing money at them in the hopes of clawing something back has become my norm and i'm so fed up with it.

Reviews.title: When is a guarantee not a guarantee?…
Reviews.detailed_review:
On Saturday 22nd June I placed a £20ew Double on
Jewel of London at 40/1 and
Haatem at 4/1.
Jewel of London's sp was 80/1 and Haatem won at 4/1
However, William Hills refused to honour their Best odds guarantee which is disgusting as I backed Maw Lam at 33/1(returned at 40/1)4 days earlier and they paid me at 40/1.
It would appear they pick and choose when to honour their guarantees.
My best advice is avoid them like the plague.

Reviews.title: Got an email from them today saying…
Reviews.detailed_review: Got an email from them today saying they are closing my account down. I've messaged them yes i was placed on self-exclusion voluntarily with gamstop for 5 years after I was assaulted having a brain haemorrhage. My brother registered me with my permission for self exclusion which ended on the 31st August 2023. It was confirmed by gamstop my exclusion period had ended. I went through half and hour conversation with William Hill safer gambling team they opened my account 48 hours later. Now just under 11 months later they are possibly going to close my account again. It's now under review. To be honest with you my problem isn't gambling I waste more money playing app games because I get competitive. With gambling I do not chase my losses. With my games I obviously always lose because I can't win money playing. Top eleven manager or mini football
